name: A Game developers Nightmare [Ludum Dare 47]
description:
:

In this game , you must guide the computer block to the red cancel button in order to fix the infinite loop that was caused by a Game developer's procrastination . The program is instable and due to some errors the first four player inputs are looped forever . 

How To Play : 

Use the arrow keys to move . Left mouse click and drag the directional blocks to place them on the grid . The computer block will be forced the move in the direction of the directional block . This will only happen if the directional blocks are inside or adjacent (Top , Bottom , Left or Right) to the Computer .

Additional Details : 

This is the first time I am entering Ludum Dare and would love your feedback ! I hope to become a better game developer in the future .

https://twitter.com/Thrun_r
